name: Gamble RPG
description:
Gamble RPG - Game in which you can find a lot of different gambling games.

🃏Games that you can find:

Clicker (Click click and earn starting diamonds, experience)
Roulette (Spin the wheel of roulette and multiply your earnings)
Towers (Try to reach the top! each level double's your bet)
Crash (Riskiest game, try to reach top fast)
Dices (Roll the dice, set your winning chance and multiplier)
Blackjack (Play most popular casino game 21 and double your bet)

Try to complete all quests, buy upgrades and don't forget to spin daily lucky wheel!!
